title: PBL-CL Instructional Design Workshop for Enhancing Scientific Creativity in Early Childhood Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A competency-building course applying PBL-CL methodologies, enabling in-service early childhood educators to design and implement scientific creativity education for young children.

learning_goals: Design PBL-CL science activity modules for young children using the ADDIE model’s five phases (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation)
Develop instructional plans by integrating cooperative learning structures (Jigsaw, STAD, etc.) into scientific inquiry activities (observation, prediction, experimentation)
Create and implement assessment rubrics to enhance young children’s scientific creativity (originality, fluency, elaboration)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
